Summary: Fist actual event I have ever witnessed!
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around July 25th 2012
divs: sighting detailswow,,, on the way home from the bowling alley, and just before getting home i notice in the sky 5 ufo���s! not sure what it was but it was huge glowing lights oval shaped, glowing from behind the clouds! i could not see the objects, but very clearly the white\glow, they put off! they stayed in one area of the sky, but darted around at high speed, in erratic patterns but in one general area. sometimes they became one, where they all darted to the center together, then would turn into 5 individual units darting around one general area in the sky.. this lasted for a good 10 minutes! this was about 6 miles south of kci just off of 152, and k highway! when i got home i got out of the car, and looked up and it was still going on! it was not search lights, no beam going up from the ground, it was not lighting, it has movement in what i would call a playful motion. this was the first time this skeptic has ever seen first hand something that strange������ a true ufo sighting!! i have no clue what it was, but hoped to hear others witnessed it too!
